comment: Classic Canadian whiskey.  Rye, spice, with a milder ‘burn’ to it than some other ‘bottom shelf’ whiskeys.   Bit of fruit, apple in the body, finish isn’t too harsh at all!
Much better than the bottom shelf price suggests. It may be thought of as a mixer, but it’s surprisingly complex as a sipper. Nice stuff, and I LOVE the retro 1970s bottle.
